recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and saut√© chopped onion and minced garlic until golden brown.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
instructions: Rinse quinoa and cook according to package instructions.
Roast chickpeas with a drizzle of olive oil and your favorite spices until crispy.
Steam broccoli florets and julienne carrots.
Assemble bowls with cooked quinoa, roasted chickpeas, steamed broccoli, julienned carrots, sliced avocado, cucumber, and cherry tomatoes.
Drizzle with hummus and tahini dressing.
Sprinkle sesame seeds on top for added crunch.
Enjoy your nutritious and delicious Vegetarian Buddha Bowl!
